jpm.description: A simple command line tool, taking inspiration from Node's npm, to manage Maven dependencies for Java projects that are not using build systems like Maven or Gradle.

jpm-latest.description: A simple command line tool, taking inspiration from Node's npm, to manage Maven dependencies for Java projects that are not using build systems like Maven or Gradle.

jvm.description: A command line tool that helps you install and manage multiple Java versions on your machine..

jvm-latest.description: A command line tool that helps you install and manage multiple Java versions on your machine..
